text:
──"Idol Battle by the Seaside",
the battle begins here!!

Asahi-chan, Fuyuko-chan,
I heard something serious...!

It's about connections with voting fans, sponsors, etc, and
there's talk about units already decided to win the Grand Prize...!

Haha. Even if we give an amazing performance,
everyone will vote for the other side, so it's meaningless~

Sorry, both of you!
I got a terrible score...!

Wow... That girl's dance earlier was a perfect copy...
Well, Asahi-chan's even more amazing... but...

...Apparently, you don't get points for breaking the rules
right, Asahi... why...

The rules didn't say it was forbidden!
I thought if it's the same dance, you can see who's better...
...That's sure to cause resentment, isn't it...

You're not considering others enough...
You act and speak as you please, thinking only of yourself...

That kind of naive honesty doesn't work in the real world
...It's a ridiculous world...!

──But, you know! We, um, felt happy
getting revenge for you! So...

──Shut up.
I understand without needing an explanation.

...you will be punished for your selfishness.
Stay quiet during Fuyu's performance.

and don't miss a single second...
I'll show you what it means for idols to fight.
